solution_line_template: Emma will earn an annual ROI of ${emma_annual_roi} for {num_years} years for a total of ${emma_annual_roi}*{num_years} = $<<{emma_annual_roi}*{num_years}={emma_total_roi}>>{emma_total_roi}

Briana will earn an annual ROI of ${briana_annual_roi} for {num_years} years for a total of ${briana_annual_roi}*{num_years} = $<<{briana_annual_roi}*{num_years}={briana_total_roi}>>{briana_total_roi}
The difference between their ROI after 2 years is ${briana_total_roi}-${emma_total_roi} = $<<{briana_total_roi}-{emma_total_roi}={roi_difference}>>{roi_difference}
